tha-ap503:11.4: yenicchakā yadicchakā → yenicchakā yathicchakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); yadicchakāyadicchakā (mr)
tha-ap503:12.4: bibbohanasamāyutaṃ → bimbohanasamāyutaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
tha-ap503:15.2: sāyaṃ pātamupaṭṭhahuṃ → sāyaṃ pātaṃ upaṭṭhahuṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sāyapātamupaṭṭhahuṃ (csp1ed)
